item.title: Site dev: What I Learned
item.description: This article was meant to be published last year, but here we go. I will update this post as time goes by, sharing more things I learn and discover. In early of 2023, I discovered Hugo, a Static Site Generator. Additionally, I learned about Tailwindcss. I don’t have a lot of experience when it comes to developing websites. I have made websites with plain HTML, CSS, and even Bootstrap, but they were mostly for fun projects that I didn’t finish and eventually abandoned.
